src:
Com Chico Diaz, Gleici Damasceno quer mostrar sua faceta de atriz em 'Noites Alienígenas'
Longa de Sérgio de Carvalho mostra a realidade da periferia de Rio Branco
02 Nov 2019, 12:30 by Fabiana Schiavon

São Paulo
text:
With Chico Diaz, Gleici Damasceno wants to show off her actress facet in 'Alien Nights'
Sérgio de Carvalho's film shows the reality of the periphery of Rio Branco
Nov 02 2019, 12:30 PM by Fabiana Schiavon

Sao Paulo
